section.ja: 工学部 応用化学・生命工学科
section.en: Faculty of Engineering, Department of Chemistry and Bioengineering, Faculty of Engineering

research_field.ja: 構造有機化学、物理有機化学

department.en: Graduate School, Division of Natural Science

paper_title.en: Novel generation of selenoaldehydes through stannic chloride-induced unsymmetrical C-Se bond cleavage of bis(N,N-dimethylcarbamoylseleno)methanes

description.en: Treatment of a benzene or a CH2Cl2 solution of bis(N,N-dimethylcarbamoylseleno)methanes with SnCl4 afforded β-1,3,5-triselenanes, and the key intermediates, acylselonium ions and selenoaldehydes, were successfully trapped by using allyltrimethylsilane or 2,3-dimethyl-1,3-butadiene to obtain the allylation products or the cycloadducts, respectively. © 2005 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: A preparation of alkyl or alkenyl N,N-dimethylchalcogenocarbamates and their one-step conversion into symmetrical dialkyl or dialkenyl dichalcogenides

description.en: Alkyl or alkenyl N,N-dimethylchalcogenocarbamates were easily prepared by a stepwise treatment of bis(N,N-dimethylcarbamoyl) dichalcogenides with NaH or NaBH4, followed by various alkylating agents or acetylenes bearing electron-withdrawing substituents. The one-step conversion of alkyl or alkenyl N,N-dimethylselenocarbamates or N,N-dimethyltellurocarbamates into the corresponding symmetrical dialkyl or dialkenyl dichalcogenides was also achieved efficiently by treating with SnCl4.

publication_name.en: BULLETIN OF THE CHEMICAL SOCIETY OF JAPAN

paper_title.en: Synthesis of 1,2,4-dichalcogenazoles by the reaction of 6H-1,3,5-oxachalcogenazines with elemental chalcogen

description.en: A series of 1,2,4-dichalcogenazoles were synthesized by the reaction of 6H-1,3,5-oxachalcogenazines with elemental chalcogen through the plausible pathway involving in situ generation of 1,3-chalcogenaza-1,3-butadienes and the subsequent reaction with chalcogen species. Synthetic utilities of 1,2,4-dichalcogenazoles were also explored. (C) 2004 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Novel conversion of 6H-1 3,5-oxathiazine S-oxides into 3H-1 2,4-dithiazoles by treating with Lawesson's reagent

description.en: Treatment of 6H-1,3,5-oxathiazine S-oxides by Lawesson's reagent (LR) at high temperature furnished 3H-1,2,4-dithiazoles in moderate to good yields. Deoxygenation of 6H-1,3,5-oxathiazine S-oxides was performed by LR in the presence of EtOH. (C) 2004 Wiley Periodicals, Inc.

paper_title.en: Novel conversion of 6H-1,3,5-oxathiazine S-oxides into 5-membered heterocyclic compounds

description.en: 5H-1,2,4-oxathiazoles were efficiently synthesized from 6H-1,3,5-oxathiazine S-oxides by thermal cycloreversion of the substrates and the products were effectively converted into 1,2,4-thiadiazoles. (C) 2004 Wiley Periodicals, Inc.

paper_title.en: Novel generation and ring closure of 1,3-thiaza-1,3-butadiene S-oxides through thermal cycloreversion of 6H-1,3,5-oxathiazine S-oxides

description.en: Heating of 6H-1,3,5-oxathiazine S-oxides efficiently afforded 1,2,4-oxathiazoles through the mechanism involving thermal cycloreversion of the substrates and the subsequent ring closure of the intermediary 1,3-thiaza-1,3-butadiene S-oxides. (C) 2003 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Novel Synthesis and Thermal Ring Fission of 7-Aryl-1,2,3,4,5,7-pentathiazocanes.(jointly worked)
Regioselective Monohalogenation of 3, 3-Disubstituted Bornane-2-thiones via Thione-Dihalogen Complexes.(jointly worked)
Generation of 1, 3-Chalcogenaza-1, 3-butadienes by Thermal Cycloreversion of 2, 4, 6-Trisubstituted 6H-1, 3, 5-Oxachalcogenazines.(jointly worked)
Oxidation of Sterically-Crowded Selones Using Chloramine-T : Generation and Skeletal Rearrangement of Selone Se-Imides.(jointly worked)
Synthesis of 1, 2, 4-Ditellurazolidines by Oxidative Ring Contraction of 2H, 6H-Tetrahydro-1, 5, 3, 7-ditelluradiazocines.(jointly worked)
Pummerer-type α-Functionalization of Arylseleninylacetates by Treating with Trimethyl silyl-or Tri-n-butylstannyl-masked Nucleophiles and Trifluoroacetic Anhydride or a Lewis Acid. (jointly worked)
Formation of kinetically stabilized dithiiranes by treating thione S-oxides bearing a bulky substituent with Lawesson's reagent

description.en: Treatment of sterically crowded thione S-oxides derived from d-camphor with Lawesson's reagent afforded dithiiranes along with deoxygenation of the starting materials, and the mixtures were subjected to mCPBA oxidation to give the corresponding dithiirane S-oxides and thione S-oxides.

paper_title.en: Synthesis of Dialkenyl Dichalcogenides via Alkenechalcogenolate Ions Generated by Treating Ketone p-Toluenesulfonylhydrazones with a Base and Elemental Chalcogen. (jointly worked)
Conversion of 2-Methylthio-4-trifluoroacetyl-5,6-dihydro-4H-1,3,4-thiadiazines into α, β-Unsaturated Esters via Carbanion-Induced Ring Opening and Desulfurization. (jointly worked)
Generation of 1,3-Selenaza-1,3-butadienes by Thermal Cycloreversion of 2,4, 6-Trisubstituted 6H-1,3,5-Oxaselenazines. (jointly worked)
Efficient Synthesis of Selenocarbonyl Compounds by Treating Carbongl Compounds with Bis(1,5-cyclooctanediylboryl) Selenide. (jointly worked)
A Willgerodt-Kindler Type Selenation of Dihalomethane Derivatives, Chloroform, and Sodium Trichloroacetate by Treating with a Base, Elemental Selenium, and an Amine. (jointly worked)
A Pummerer-Type Novel Ring Fission of 2-Methylsulfinyl-5,6-dihydro-4H-1,3,4-thiadizine Derivatives : A Homologation of Aldehydes and Ketones(jointly worked)
A HOMOLOGATION OF ALDEHYDES AND KETONES VIA THE FORMATION AND THE SUBSEQUENT PUMMERER-TYPE RING FISSION OF 2-METHYLSULFINYL-5,6-DIHYDRO-4H-1,3,4-THIADIAZINE DERIVATIVES

description.en: A two-carbon homologation of aldehydes and ketones was achieved by using a sequence involving the formation and the subsequent Pummerer-type ring fission of 5,6-dihydro-4H-1,3,4-thiadiazine rings possessing methylsulfinyl functionality at C-2.
